net.threescale.api.cache

Interface ApiCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheImplCommon, ConfiguredCacheImpl, DefaultCacheImpl, NullCacheImpl

    public interface ApiCache
    Interface for ApiCaches.
